string.text: What are you?
%C [255,255,125.0] You asked to approach you when I rest.

Yes. So, look: you, and a couple more boys pits a green in the village of Green. They are already waiting for you and aware of everything. Do not brand it and do not rage especially with trunks! This greens itself will cross in any way when she sees you. They should not interfere. Your task with the bunker toad to meet and scare it. Let this dick pay for the "roof". Beat pieces of 10 per day. And yes, the old toad will understand that we will not kill him, but if he fucked, then we need to scare him, yeah?
So sharply will we dump our eggs?

I see no reason not to do this. Here, any person in the group costs a dozen such greenery as in the village, if not more expensive. Even Senka. Although he is a drunk, but when sober, he shoots S-Suke, more precisely, the arrow of Voroshilovsky. Oh yes, the sour wanted to see you. There he is behind you on the couch.
No problems. I went.
Brother, do you need help?

Yes, listen. In short, this is a tape recorder here and cassettes, broken truth. I would like to get some normal cassettes. If you find, drag me. I will pay for each. If what, you can listen to their contents yourself.
Cassettes? It would be better if he raised his ass and took up the deed, instead of sitting here and listening to the cassettes.
Drop it. You also need to rest.
Okay, if anything falls - I will bring.
Cassette with number "45"
Cassette with number "16"
Cassette with number "19"
Cassette with number "132"
Cassette with number "68"
Cassette with number "2"
I found some cassette ...
Well, show it.
Forget.
%C [255,255,125.0] I am ready. Let's go.
We pointedly pass through the village. Not really shawl, just go to the bunker. Negotiations on you.
Understood.
Fine. We will stay here in the village. Follow, let's say. And you Cheshi on the ATP and tell me what and how.
%C [255,255,125.0] Torgash agreed to pay. 10, as expected.
Chu-oo-ok! Go to the chaban, he stumbled upon some garbage and was looking for you.
%C [255,255,125.0] Diplomacy ... I came out not very successful.
Didn't understand.
The old toad refused to pay the appointed amount. He feels that we will not touch him, threw off the price of up to 6 thousand.
You are a crap negotiator, a jamb after you. Here's what: Kaban found something and wanted you to help him.
%C [255,255,125.0] Well, Sidor, old toad, how is life?
Well, until your herd has been poured.
You offend.
What do you need?
So, such a topic ... We will be this, we will roof it, yeah? And you have to pay for the roof.
So I thought ... Did you come to shake money from me and greenery? Well, you and goats.
Are we goats? Have you seen your prices? Torgash of the cherov. I can be offended.
How many?
10 thousand per day.
Okay, knowing you, sick bastards, I better agree.
Come on without this, I came to negotiate a non-normal one.
Many. 8 - End.
But-no! Think about greenery in the village. Do you want to be left without customers? Do you understand what I'm talking about?
Okay ... 10 so 10 pieces. Just go already.
You won't pay - just kill you.
The gut is thin from you to kill me. You know very well what will go for it. And for threats I lower the board to 6 pieces.
That's good. Tomorrow guys will come for money.
Yes. Remember I found that black garbage, which glows blue and "buzzes"?
Well, yes.
In short, as I understand it, this is some kind of "box". There is something inside. I have an idea how to open it, but I need your help.
Come on, lead. I wonder what is the nonsense.
Wait a minute ... I open ... go a little.
Fine.
Are you ok?!
C-s-due... Ay, fucking! Create...
Can you go?
Yes ... like yes ... how it hurts.
Come on, let's go back. The main thing that survived.
%C [255,255,125,0] Is everything good?
Yes ... I have it ... I need to move away from this a bit. Let's talk later, huh?
Fine.
And hello to you. Do you want to cut the grandmas?
Why do you offer it to me, and not someone from the village?
These idiots are afraid of these idiots. And stalkers from the farm no longer go here. They have their own bargaining, the whole business is destroyed by a bitch.
Hmm ... okay, I'll think about your assumption.
Listen, Sidorych, do you accidentally know where the missionary is now?
I have no idea.
%C [255,255,125.0] Claw, do you know where the missionary is?
Maybe I know. But where did you get that I will tell you?
Maybe we will agree? Help with what?

I strained me with money. I'll tell you for 10 thousand. And with this work I give you: here a couple of stalkers left the caches to check their own, but did not return. I saw where they went about, but I can't leave the camp myself. I also can't send greens from the village. You will find them and pay 10 thousand - I'll tell you where to look for the one you need.
La-a-Avo. Give a label for your poor.
%C [255,255,125.0] Wouldn't you go to check the caches?
T-you who?! What do you need?!
The claw sent me for you, greens. What happened?
He ... Kabani killed him!
Something is not very similar. There is no one nearby.
They ... ran away ...
Yes? Are you sure of that?
We went to take my caches ... He said that this was his caches ... And then the dogs attacked and bit him, and then I scared them off ...
First, wild boars, now dogs ... I see this hole in his head. So tell me that he was filling him up.
I ... I ... why ... how so ...
Well good to whine. Cheshi to the claw. He will deal with you.
This is not me ... True ... please ...
Go, until you lie next to him.

%C [255,255,125.0] A strange situation happened there. The boy killed his friend. Says the mutants attacked. Then he said that his friend wanted to appropriate his caches. Understand yourself in this matter.
I doubt that he could kill his friend ... After all, from childhood they have known and have always been "do not spill water."
Claw, you are longer than me in the zone. You should know how everything happens here.
Okay, yes ... you're right, probably. You will have another 10 thousand with you, and then I will tell you where the person you are looking for.
%C [255,255,125.0] Here's the money.
So listen. Your stalker is on the farm. As far as I know, every night he leaves the base to one grave. You can find him there.
Clean you need here, rat bandit?
Well, fucking right on the head ... I need a missionary. You are stalkers, and sometimes you behave worse than bandits.
It's not for you to judge me, bitch. Why the hell do you need a missionary?
And you should not fuck you.
He owes me money. That's all.
Debts ... then listen here. The missionary picked up the "landfill". He is being laid down at the base in an extremely dick state.
I will not let this bastard die until he pays the debt ... I can do something?

Actually ... you can. You saw a bubble above the embankment? So: under the nearest trailer east from the bubble, I left a bag with herbs. And you also need to find a "scarlet flower". They get out of rusty technology. One such I recently saw on a fallen diesel locomotive, which is located in the east of the railway. From these things you can make serum.
Okay, I'm going. Wait.
Have you picked it up?
*Inject the syringe to the stalker*
Now, wait a bit.
Fu-uh ... thank you ... True, I am very grateful ...
What happened?
One stalker shot me. He left me to die, but you came and saved me ...
Why does he need it?

Don't know. Uh ... you see this garbage? *The stalker shows an incomprehensible device that is remotely similar to the PDA*. She from time to time catches strange signals in this house. Specifically in it. I tried to walk around the cordon, but there was no nifig. Listen, I'll go to the base and treat. I can't repay you for your help yet. Meet me later and I will pay you, yeah?
Okay. Right.

Hmm ... I have an idea. Although I could not find the places where signals appear, this does not mean that they are not. Can you look for them? Then I will pay with you and for the salvation and for the unraveling of this secret at a time.
I'll try, come on.
%C [255,255,125.0] I need inward.
Who are you?
Let go. I am on behalf of the miserable. I took the grass.
He talked about you, yes. Come.
Let go. I brought herbs for a missionary.
Oh how ... how do you know?
I know that's it. I need your "sick".
No. I will not let you go. Prove that you can trust you.
I helped plush in a destroyed house opposite the farm.
So it was you? Okay, you can pass.
And how?
You probably heard that in the northern checkpoint some garbage divorced and everyone goes to the landfill now only through the tunnel west?
Suppose.
On the checkpoint this is my collectible deck of cards. I left her there even before the checkpoint became dangerous. If you bring them, then I will miss you.
But do not you go a fuck with such requests? I'm trying to save your ", and you send me to death.
Okay ... you're right. And about the cards I lied. Okay, then it's simpler. I left a backpack with moonshine in a tunnel under the embankment. Just bring it. This is nearby.
If there is no moonshine, a funnel of Herov, I will shoot a skull to your skull.
%C [255,255,125.0] BEY. And let me go already.
Walks.
Why did you hide the grass, and not wear it with you?
Duc "your" boys go to stalkers bother. You will understand them - they will take them yet.
%C [255,255,125.0] dock, I suppose? You seem to need it.
Yes. Thank you. It remains only to wait ...
Long?
A few hours. As I understand it, do you need this stalker? You can lie down there. I will inform you when he wakes up.
To him.
%C [255,255,125.0] What happened here?
He killed the doctor and left while everyone was asleep.
How? Where?
I have no idea. The rest also know nothing.
Bitch...
Ps-s ...
What?
I saw where the missionary went. Only nobody, I ask you.
Why is it?
He killed Doca. If they find him, they will also kill him. But you need him alive, right?
Right. Where did he go?
He jumped into the bubble.
Above the embankment? Thank you.
Do you have something important?
Yes. I need a colonel.
Walks.
Thank you.
%C [255,255,125,0] have not seen each other for a long time.
That's for sure.
How is life?
You didn't come to find out about my affairs. What do you need?
I need to get to the laboratory "Irididius".
You want what you wanted! Hmm ... we, in fact, were going to send a detachment there. You, damn it, are very on time.
Seriously? Take me with you.
An-no. I can't, I'm sorry. You are not a soldier. You are an outsider.
And what am I, in your army, damn it?
Well, why. I can actually organize you a "ticket", but not for it.
I recognize you ... and what do you need?
You see, the guys on the checkpoint have "unfinished" things here. They will fly only when they finish them.
I understand ... Speak who needs help there.
Here you have the list. You will help them - I will accept you in the detachment.
%C [255,255,125.0] It seems that everything ...
Yes. You really helped everyone. Listen, don't you want to sit with the guys? Chat in front of the flight.
That ... good.
%C [255,255,125.0] Strong garbage, however. Surprisingly, my head does not even hurt.
There is almost no hangover from this rubbish. The guys are already making the last preparations there. Come on, go to them and fly.
So for sure!
%C [255,255,125.0] something ... We sat well.
Yeah, that's for sure. Come on, climb inside. We will finish cooking and fly out.
Ug.
Hey, what are you doing?
What do you care?
I know what kind of notebook this is. Uh ... Listen, don't you want to sell it? I'll give you 20 thousand and ... a good detector! How do you look at this?
Money will not be superfluous. Yes, and the detector will come in handy. Let's.
No, I myself liked the notebook. Sorry.
I thought so ... Take a notebook.
Thank you. As I said, take a detector, still I am looking for artifacts badly, and there is little money. For the sake of this, it is not a pity.
%C [255,0,128,0] what is so sad?

A? Yes, I lost my graphic tablet somewhere. Mmmm ... I like to draw. Uh ... can you find it? Please. He is very dear to me. I will give you something interesting in return! The tablet is somewhere on the southern part of the cordon, I did not go further than the railway.
Take away, artist.
You found him! Thank you! Here is my old notebook. This is since the time when I drew on paper ... I no longer need it, I have copies of the drawings.
Tell me what interesting?

In short, I found some kind of key recently, but I can't understand what it is from. Throwing, you know, it's a pity. You never know come in handy. Gee. And so there was no interesting nifiga lately. That's my leg except that he turned it up. It still hurts, bastard.
You, by chance, were not on the northern path two weeks ago? I was then in the Watch, I saw you. Only without a bandage.
Was. I recognized you too. Then you dragged the wounded stalker on yourself. Respect.
Strange. Then you did not shoot, and now you are not shooting. For bandyuk - the behavior is strange. Tell me what kind of story you have?
Not everyone who is in a leather scumbag. I myself used to go in shape. VVshnik, Kharkov. For many years. Until I got into the ears.
Yeah, and now you are hiding among those whom you yourself used to catch?

Not everything is so simple. There was one raid. Normal stripping. Only then it turned out - not everything was according to the charter. The command threw it, dumped everything on me. Like, the "initiative on the spot." Although the orders were clear.
Familiar. There is only one in the papers, on the ground - completely different.
So I remained extreme. On the lip, then under the tribunal. But I left. Through the checkpoint, to the zone. It is better to become a ghost here than to rot for what you did not.
Why to the bandits? Could “freedom” or to ordinary stalkers.

I tried it. Nobody needs a former warrior with a spoiled story. In "duty" - immediately check, almost with exposure. And in the gang - accepted. Silently. Your rules, dirt, yes. But you can live. They don't ask who you were here. Just look so that you do not give it up.
And how is it to be on the other side?
I'm not on the side. I am between. Neither here nor here. I just live. There is no one to pay more than myself except myself. Debts ... precisely because of one such I am here ...
You could take me off on the trail then. Why didn't you?
Because you dragged yours. You are not an enemy to me. I also had such in the unit. Not sold.
I see ... you ... look at both. The zone is worse than the tribunal.
That's for sure...
Tell about yourself.
Eh ... sometimes I remember - well, I was bad. Before the zone, I was spinning in the brigade, in Orekhovo. There were heavy guys. Real office.
Op ... So you are from the organized crime group? Not just a gopnik from a gateway?
No, I say - a specific topic. Grits, roofs, machine guns in the trunk. We even had his own, from the Urals.
And what did you do? Did you really shoot? Or more show -off?

They shot. And not Ponaroshka. The business was divided, the points were squeezed, the boys were put on the bazaars. There was one case - the Georgian clan climbed onto our car wash ... In the morning, three of them were in the trunk near the garages. No question.
And garbage? It seems like in the nineties they sting all ...

We are not suckers. They had their own in the department. One major personally released us by call. The main thing was not to go into politics. And so - freedom, grandmas, trunks. Even with Chechens, a couple of times on the arrows crossed.
Not a damn thing for yourself ... And what has you become with a brigade?

Schookach started. A month later, the six were taken, three were laid, the "looking" - they found in the forest in a barrel. I miraculously dumped. Through Belarus. And then - a zone. Here, oddly enough, calmer. There is a barrel, there is work, and no one shoots in the back ... Until you jerk yourself.
Listen ... And you, it turns out, is not just a bandit. You are one of those who survived. They respect us.
Yes, I respect the drum. I'm here to live. The rest is dust.
And right. After all, there is also its own organized crime group - only instead of bazaars artifacts, instead of shooters - caches. All according to concepts, only others.
Tell about yourself.
Hey, Inc ... But before my life was sweet. To all this shitty zone.
She don't go. Everyone here is the same - former thieves in law, just like a template. What did you hunt?
I was a pickpocket. Profi. In the subway, at stations, in the markets. Gold, mobile phones, wallets - everything went into business.
Just like in a movie, right? Come on, tell me how exactly someone was cleaned.

There was a case in Yerevan, do you know such a market? There one fat huckster walked, a chain on his neck - like a bull. I have been passing it for a week. Then - Bach, in the crush at the stall under the noise - and my chain. I didn't even pick it up.
And if you picked?
Then the plan "b". I had a partner, Vaska. He would have distracted him, such as "Uncle, no light?" And I - FUUT - and in the crowd. There is no longer to find.
Famously. Why did you go to the zone? Are the pockets ended?

The cops were taken to Vaska, and I felt that the cover was nearby. A pair of acquaintances in the pre -trial detention center has already rotted. Here is either a prison or a cemetery. And the zone - although she is eating, but honest in his own way.
Yeah ... here at least everything is simple: either you, or you. Without judges, without pieces of paper.
Yeah. And the chains are different here - you will hang an artifact in the neck, and it is fonet so that then it glows from your ears ...
Well, you, damn it, a philosopher! Come on, for a former life. And so that in the zone the bullets are bypassed by us.
He said well. Let's.
Tell about yourself.
Eh ... there were times. I was engaged in business to the zone ... serious. Not like now - to run with warriors on the bushes. The real gop-stop was, on a grand scale!
Oh well? Are you serious? Where, in Rostov, or what?
In the suburbs, mainly. Deaf routes, you know ... where the lanterns do not burn and there are fewer cops than zombies in a red forest.
And what did they stop on the road?

Well, how. We put the car across, I go out with a kogoshka - "Good evening, documents, wallet, life ..." - and all according to the standard. Once a trucker, a fool, climbed into a glove compartment - I thought the barrel was pulling. I had to shoot at the wheels. And then he jumped out of the cabin himself, wet pants, can you imagine?
Ha! Beautiful. Didn't they rob the girls?
Women were not touched. We had a rule. Loot, wheelbarrows, equipment - yes. But without dirt. We are not animals, Inc.
I respect. And garbage?

It was more difficult with them. Once I almost got caught. They drove behind us through a forest belt, I am a jam - gas to the floor, a stump on a bend - a boom! The car is in a ditch, and I and Sanych in the bushes. Two days later they walked to the station.
Why did you go to the zone?
Here ... easier. No debts, no laws. Its own truth. Or you - or you. Everything is honest.
In kind. Here you even know what you are dying for ...
Tell about yourself.
Well, what ... you used to be with grandmothers before, no? What did you go to the zone?
It was a matter ... money, communications, movement. Everything is like people. Until they threw their own.
Op. Throw - how is it?

I was in the same topic. They drove the consumer goods, in some places iron, in some places - not iron. Across the border. They worked quietly, on their channels. And then - they put me in the load of "superfluous" in one walk. I did not know. There are not rags - there are trunks, and not simple, but army. With optics. They press on the border. I - eight shines. And the rest are like through the ground.
Stop, why did you even have been in the know, what are you taking?

Exactly. They gave me an invoice, said: "Rutin, as always." And I am a fool, believed. And whoever put it - I still do not know. Only one of his then sharply changed the car, bought the house and merged with ends.
And what, sat down?

A year at a pre -trial detention center, then - misunderstandings went on the case. The lawyer is muddy, the witnesses are gone. In short, they released the "drawback". But all of their own already buried me. Orders - zero, trust - minus. Corguses whisper, as they see a rat. I understood - either to fall down or fall.
And here, then?
Where else? Here - as if from a clean sheet. Everyone has their own dirt, but no one climbs. The main thing is that the hands are intact and the machine does not fall.
Fucking story, brother. And if you meet the one who set it up?
I will find. It doesn't matter where - on the Great Earth or here, in anomalies. I have an account with him. And I can wait.
Tell about yourself.
I do not like to remember it ...
Hey ... You didn't seem to be with us from the very beginning. They said you were a stalker. This is true?
Was. Two years with a tail. He worked quietly: artifacts, habar, hunting. Without heroism, without show -offs. Until the shit happened, which turned everything upside down.
What kind of shit? Someone leaked?

Partner ... Sasha. Together with him, they started with the "southern hills". Everything is together. Anomalies, creatures, even once with bandits clashed - got out. And that day ... just stupidly came out. We went into the forest for an artifact. I went first, I look - "Electra" on the side. I am bypassing, he is behind me. Only I took a step - the "meat grinder" worked under the roots. I jumped to the side - survived. He did not have time. He was torn in a second.
Happens. The zone is eating on schedule. But what does an outcast have to do with it?

And despite the fact that then three more crossed with our group. One of them then began to whisper to the other, they say, I specifically set up Sasha - so as not to share the habar. Like, I knew about the trap. And to prove the opposite how? Who is looking for the truth in the zone?
And what, did everyone turn out at once?

All. Even those with whom he divided bonfires and caught bullets. Someone whispered in the back, someone in open. One even shot in the back, missed. I understood then - I have no more place among them. No friends, no trust. One option remained - to those who do not care, who you were.
That is, to the bandits.
Yeah. Then no one asked where I came from and what I did. Only the result is important here: Khabar brought - well done. Failed the Dolgovtsy - handsome. Everything is simple. Without hypocrisy.
I understand ... You know, it happens, someone in a gang is greedy, someone is stupid, and you ... by hopelessness. The zone of such is slowly.
But honestly. I'm not pretending to be here.
If what - you are not alone now. They do not live in the zone for a long time.
I already understood. Thank you.
Tell about yourself.
Do you definitely want to know?
You are not one of those who immediately went to the gang. It can be seen that I did not come here by grandmas. Tell me?
This is not for the ears. But you are normal. Okay, listen.
Let's.
I had a man. Young woman. Lena. Clean, bright ... I even tied it with a movement for her - I worked as a loader, lived on a removable one, saved up for a wedding.
And what happened?

One bastard. The son of a local businessman. I'm used to it that everything is possible. Got drunk. I saw her in the evening at the stop. I took it. Then - raped ... and killed. The body was found two days later in a forest belt.
Your mother ...

The court was. Dad decided everything. Lawyer, cop, linden examination. "There was not enough evidence." He was not even taken into custody. He laughed in the courtroom. He looked at me right. Then I realized - there is no law. There are only you and the barrel.
Are you his?

Yes. After two weeks. I caught at the cottage. At first I just wanted to in the chest - quickly. But then ... it did not work. I let him feel. How is it to be helpless. How it is to pray, but they don't hear you. I did what I wanted. And then - burned the house. With ends.
Have you been looking for you?
Not long. The cameras burned, evidence too. But I knew that sooner or later it would pop up. So he left. To the zone. Here no one will say "you can't." Here you can truly disappear.
Listen ... I thought you were just silent. And you ... you are a man. Real.
I was there with her, with her. And here ... Here I just live. Every day - without a name and without memory.
Will we have a drink for her?
For her.
Tell about yourself.
About yourself?
Well, yes. You definitely not cleaned the cop before? You have so ... neat habits. What did you do to the zone?
The housekeeper was. From an apartment to an apartment - like a watch. He climbed at night when the residents are at work. Quickly, quietly, without show -offs.
Ha, serious? How in the cinema - amushes, gloves, thieves romance?
Like that. Until one day I went ... not there.
Come on, lay out. What kind of apartment?

The area is elite, a lot of money. They brought it to one hut - supposedly a family on vacation, all the chicks -bumps. He went up to the third, hacked the castle - like a clock. I go - dark, silence. I think: "Now I will collect and dump everything." And there - not empty.
Who was?

Man. One. He sits in a chair opposite the TV ... and looks. Does not move. And then I realized: he is dead. Eyes are open, face with a purple tint. On the floor - blood and syringes. I got up, as if dug.
Yo-mine ... you got into whose hut you climbed?
It turned out - this is the hole of some huckster, who has divisions with serious people. Someone was already ahead of him, sewn. And I - climbed the cameras as "the one who was the last."
And garbage?

They came in a day. The neighbors heard “suspicious noise” - yeah, as if I turned on the vacuum cleaner. I managed to get away, but both the cops and his "friends" began to look for me. The city has become cramped. One path remained - to the zone. And here, oddly enough, calmer.
So it's not a zone ate you - you yourself fled to my mouth.
Right. Only in the mouth, where everyone has a knife, you even know where the blow to wait from.
Well, brother, you have a movie life. And now - you sniff with us on the holes and you are waiting for a warrior ...
Better here. Here, if you die, then honestly. Not for the jamb of a stranger, but for his own.
Tell about yourself.
Never fall into debt. Even if it seems that "proven people." Especially then.
Not from a good life, people are in the zone - and so it is clear. Well, tell me. To whom and for what have you owed?
Then I had "my people." Connections, a scheme with smuggling - equipment, spare parts, sometimes weapons. Everything went clearly until one party went into the pipe.
Hijacked?

Worse. One of ours decided to quickly cut the dough and leaked the load with the other side. And what would you think? The party was purchased with the money of brigade authority. Debt is forty thousand with greenery. And I'm extreme. On the papers - everything is on me.
Yes, they should have bury you.

Almost. They immediately handed me "hello" - they burned the car, broke my nose to my wife, and hinted: "either grandmas or horizontal plane." Options - zero. I sold everything that was. Hut, wheelbarrow, equipment. There were ten pieces left. And they were waiting.
And you dumped?

On the night of the train, through the conductor - towards the south. Then - checkpoint. Fake docks. And then - only the zone. Then they will not be poked. They themselves are afraid. The zone is the only place where even those like them are not the main ones.
And if they find? Everything happens right there.
They will find it - I will not leave. I have already become different here. There is only one duty - to survive. And he is at everyone.
Listen ... And I thought you were just an old double bass. And you have a story in a book.
Only this book will not end. Either a bullet, or a mutant, or an anomaly ... but definitely not a debt receipt ...
Tell about yourself.
You were not always here. Who brought you to the gang? Well, you are like those who are once rummaging.

I didn't drag me here ... Friends called me. From the camp yet. We rolled stages together. Then to the will - and in the zone. “There is a job, there will be a hack, your weapon, live - I don't want to,” they said.
And what was it normal?
At first - yes. Seven of us were. We went to warehouses, shot stalkers, shared honestly. Without a substitution. Your brotherhood, understand?
And where did they all go?

The zone, brother, cannot be deceived. One flew into the anomaly, did not notice the "fluff" in the fog. \ n the second snorkes tore - at the agricultural industry. We came late then. \ n the third freak, climbed into the laboratory. Myself. Found him a couple of days later. Without a face.
And the rest?

The other warriors were removed. There was an old argument-they once cut someone from them. They were waiting. They set up through the left cache. I stayed. The latter ... \ n sometimes I think - maybe I should have been the first ...
Come on ... maybe you're just tenacious.
Or just did not reach his mistake. Bye. But you know what? I remember everything for them. And while I am alive, they have not disappeared. Let the dirt go through my hands, but the memory is pure
You are not just meat. You are the memory of the gang. Respect.
Tell about yourself.
Why did this interest you my past?
Some kind of ... intelligence is slipping. Where did you dig before?
